actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Resolution to continue through July 31, 1975 the authority for committees to pay compensation and make expenditures for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: Revises Senate Resolution III, 94th Congress as agreed to March 17, 1975, to extend through July 31, 1975, the authority of Senate committees to pay compensation and make expenditures for inquiries and investigations, and for other purposes.

titles.title: Resolution to continue through July 31, 1975 the authority for committees to pay compensation and make expenditures for inquiries and investigations.
